name: Knightside
description:
KNIGHTSIDE is a tactical puzzle RPG, drawing inspiration from classic roguelites.

Explore the wild, fight or flee from monsters and find or buy better equipment, each piece of which will dramatically change your capabilities.

During combat, you can always see how enemies will respond to your move before you commit. The enemies work together to trap you in bad situations, so you'll need to plan ahead!

This is a prototype. Try it out (it's free!) and let us know what you think.

Also available at https://knightside.io
